intro:
The United Generations project research led by Adalberto Lonardi during his MA Interior Design at the Royal College of Art (2020). 
From the preliminary two-years investigation about the critical role of the ageing population today, to the past and present of The Golden Lane Estate, to the architectural-visual design and delivery of a possible future for the communities of London.

hero.alt: The United Generations schemes ecosystem (Mixed-media digital collage, 2020)
